text: Midnight LibraryMidnight Library I don t know if anyone s familiar with the book  but  spoiler  basically the premise is that the main character tries to kill herself after experiencing heavy regrets and she does  but before she actually dies she gets to the  midnight library  And essentially there are an infinite number of books and each book has a different life where you made different decisions and you re allowed to stay in the one that you feel is  right I m young  late teens  but man  Do I relate to the main character  I wish SO badly I could go to my own midnight library  I have many regrets that I wish I could change but it s too late to go back  I can t undo them  I struggle with basic decisions and I think the further I go in life the worse it ll get  I want to kill myself  but before I do I d like to know what my life may have been like if I had done things differently  Maybe I d be happier  Maybe I d already be dead  It d be great to just live in someone else s life yet my own life  even if just for a bit Don t know if anyone else feels the same side note  I wrote this before I had finished the book and I just finished it  I know that how I m feeling isn t what the author intended but this desire is what really struck me  It s a good book btw  I liked it
summary: Midnight Library is a book about a girl who wants to kill herself but before she does, she visits the midnight library. She has many regrets that she wishes she could change, but it's too late to go back and she can't undo them.

text: Where did I go wrong  Boyfriend from hell here I ve lost people out of my life before  a lot  It looks like my girlfriend is gonna leave  I need her to survive  I once had depression and suicidal actions  she helped me feel at peace  she healed me  But somewhere along the way  I changed  I became the boyfriend from hell more and more  and I ve started ripping stuff off the walls because none of it means shit compared to her  I love her more than anything  I ve never felt like this before about anybody  I ve had girlfriends before but she s different  I know if she leaves I m gonna get back on pills and alcohol  I can t lose her  It started when she didn t text me and I finally got through to her and she said she hadn t been doing anything  it broke my heart because just yesterday everything was fine  I fall in love all over again every time I see her  she s the most beautiful girl I ve ever seen  and I love her more than anything  I can t lose her  I don t even know if she ll ever talk to me again and I m already dying inside  The pills  the alcohol and razor blades have started to come calling  I don t want to die  but I don t have any other choice if she leaves
summary: My girlfriend is going to leave me. I love her more than anything and I don't know if she'll ever talk to me again. I want to kill myself if she leaves, but I can't lose her as she healed me from depression.
cleaned: girlfriend go leave love not know talk want kill leave not lose heal depression
